message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe its value far exceeds $1200000 to us. Considering its unique features and the benefits it can bring to you, I am extending an exclusive offer of $1500000. Let's discuss how this investment can significantly enhance your business operations.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and understand the value you place on your product. However, my budget allows me to invest up to $1200000 in this purchase. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1200000 to finalize the transaction.
